name: Tunel: The Measure of Existence
description:
REQUIRES LEAP MOTION

Tunel: The Measure of Existence

Based on ideas from the quantum theory of the multiverse, this game simulates humanity’s remarkable attempt to preserve life from an inescapable extinction.
Fueled by the movement of your hands, control the space in your tangible world to operate this virtual dimension. Navigate through extraordinary parallel universes and create unique soundtracks specific to your interactions.
